document.masterDocTitle: An update of the types of Heteroptera (Hemiptera) housed at the Museo de La Plata Entomological Collection (Argentina)

Remarks. The date of the collection of the female paratype 5173 / 38 is
14 -II- 1940
instead of
14 -XI- 1940
, as was published in the original paper. The male paratypes 5173 / 14 and 5173 / 26 have a genitalia vial attached to the pin.
